Package org.neo4j.kernel.internal.locker

Class Locker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.kernel.internal.locker.Locker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GlobalFileLocker
    public class Locker
extends Object
implements Closeable
    The class takes a lock on provided file. The lock is valid after a successful call to checkLock() until a call to close().

    • Method Detail

      • lockFile

        public final Path lockFile()

      • checkLock

        public void checkLock()
        Obtains lock on file so that we can ensure the store is not shared between different database instances

        Creates dir if necessary, creates lock file if necessary

        Please note that this lock is only valid for as long the lockFileChannel lives, so make sure the lock cannot be garbage collected as long as the lock should be valid.

        Throws:
        FileLockException - if lock could not be acquired
